requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.0 support
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM, OpenGL 3.0 support
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 9*** or better
  • DirectX: Version 10

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 460 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
